item.description: This is a follow up to the initial meeting 2weeks ago and the skype conference recently held. Need your email address to connect with those who can attend. Will review previous meeting notes and continue to develop action plan for this event. We will also delegate responsibilities so all involved will know exactly what they will be doing. My email is: lorrie.pearson@yahoo.com See you online

group.name: Boston Beauty, Fashion and Photo Stylist

item.name: 2nd planning meeting for designer collection event
